description:
'''Seto leelo''' is the [[Setos]]' [[polyphonic]] style of folk singing.

In 2009, the Seto leelo was added to the [[UNESCO]] list of [[intangible cultural heritage]]. Seto {{Lang|vro|leelo}} is usually performed by women, dressed in traditional clothing. During the Seto Kingdom Day celebration, the winning lead singer of a {{Lang|vro|leelo}} group is awarded the title of "Mother of Song".
